name: Golden? nuggets!
description:
Try to bring only gold nuggets to the golden bucket (TM) to score points!

Evil chickens and tennis balls that remarkably look like gold nuggets will hinder your progress!

Game made for the gamedev.tv Jam 2021

How to play

This is a gold nugget:

This is not. It's actually a tennis ball:

This isn't a gold nugget either:

It  is a chicken which was sleeping peacefully until you picked it up and now it's pissed off and will gorge your eyes out!

Just kidding! Thank goodness for screens!

Anyway, can you tell them apart?

...

Maybe not, but by clicking on each one of them the actual content is revealed briefly and you get an audio cue, too.

Your goal is to bring only the real gold nuggets to the golden bucket above by cliking and dragging with your mouse (or your finger on a phone or tablet). Each time you achieve this you score get 1 point and get 5 seconds more and more nuggets, real and fake are spawned. 

Bringing tennis ball and chickens to the bucket will only waste your time.

Known issues

You can only pick up nuggets  once they reach the bottom of the floor.

Credits

Coding and graphics by Juan José Bernal aka bitpatio. Sound effects extracted from samples on freesound.org

I also use the font "Contrail One" by Riccardo De Franceschi under the OFL: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Contrail+One

Software used: Godot engine, Affinity designer, audacity
